title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.3 - Dumping refuse and littering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.3 - Dumping refuse and littering

State Regulations

No person shall throw, dump or deposit or place or cause to
be thrown, dumped or deposited or placed upon the vehicular crossing any
refuse, litter or material of any kind and nature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
606.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
